overview: The second instalment of the Doctor Monkey franchise, Doctor Monkey Lady Killer is a Chinese wuxia drama set in the Qing dynasty. Yang is a benevolent doctor by day and a gentleman thief nicknamed ‘Iron Monkey’ at night. Recently, many young women in the town have gone missing. After an investigation, Yang finds all the clues pointing to the British opium dealer, Madison...

production_companies.name: Beijing Huafeng Yicai Culture Media Co., Ltd

title: Doctor Monkey: Lady Killer
